name: Maury's Madhouse
description: Maury's Madhouse is a survival game where you are a child who got stuck after hours at a children's entertainment arcade / restaurant location. You have to shoot and claw your way through mobs, mini-bosses and the final boss to finish the game. The bosses are animatronics that came alive at night, and you will be provided with multiple weapons to choose from; for example, a yo-yo or a laser-tag gun.
